actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to designate Colombia under section 244 of the Immigration and Nationality Act in order to make nationals of Colombia eligible for temporary protected status under such section.
short_title: Colombian Temporary Protected Status Act of 2003
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Columbian Temporary Protected Status Act of 2003 - Expresses the sense of Congress in favor of extending temporary protected status to Columbian nationals in the United States.Designates Columbia under the Immigration and Nationality Act as a country undergoing an ongoing armed conflict in order to make qualifying Columbians living in the United States eligible aliens for temporary protected status.

titles.title: Colombian Temporary Protected Status Act of 2003
A bill to designate Colombia under section 244 of the Immigration and Nationality Act in order to make nationals of Colombia eligible for temporary protected status under such section.
